definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Bleed photos off the edge of the page.
sentences.chinese: 出血的照片就可以超出頁邊。

sentences.english: Decorative design usually edging the page or type.
sentences.chinese: 用來圍繞頁邊或字體的裝飾設計。

sentences.english: He has the habit of making notes on the margin while reading.
sentences.chinese: 讀書時有在頁邊空白處作註釋的習慣。

sentences.english: This book’s dark aspects pool around its margins.
sentences.chinese: 本書黑暗的一面充斥在頁邊留白處。

sentences.english: Border Decorative design usually edging the page or type.
sentences.chinese: 用來圍繞頁邊或字體的裝飾設計。
縮少字型和頁邊空白處。

sentences.english: Through this, you can basically write comments into the margins of the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 這樣你就可以將你的評論寫到了互聯網的頁邊之上。

sentences.english: Students like to take notes in the margin of their textbook.
sentences.chinese: 學生們喜歡在課本的頁邊空白處記筆記。

sentences.english: One of the best ways of absorbing knowledge is to make notes in the margin while you are reading.
sentences.chinese: 獲取知識的最佳途徑之一是讀書時在頁邊作筆記。

sentences.english: This book's dark aspects pool around its margins.
sentences.chinese: 本書黑暗的一面充斥在頁邊留白處。

sentences.english: Mr. Reid made notes in the margin of a manual.
sentences.chinese: 裏德先生在一本手冊的頁邊空白處記筆記。
